extension.config.title: Replace Accents
extension.config.replaceAccents.title: Replace Accents
extension.config.accentRemoveMapping.des: Define custom character mappings for accent removal. Use this to specify how special characters should be converted (e.g., German 'ß' to 'ss', ligatures 'æ' to 'ae'). Applied after normalization.
extension.config.accentDictionary.desc: Select diacritic dictionary for restoring diacritics
extension.config.accentRestoreSuffixMatc: Try to restore accents in word endings (e.g., 'edeny' to 'edényemet'). May improve results for inflected forms but can cause incorrect matches. Leave disabled unless needed.
extension.config.accentIgnoredWords.desc: List of words to exclude from accent restoration. These words will remain unchanged even if they exist in the dictionary.
extension.category.utilities.title: Utilities
extension.category.help.title: Help
extension.command.reportIssue.title: Repost Issue
extension.command.replaceAccents.title: Remove Diacritics (áéő - aeo)
extension.command.restoreAccents.title: Restore Diacritics
